contents.text: Welcome to Affinity, the San Francisco-based leader in AI-driven relationship intelligence.
To speak with our sales team and learn about our CRM solutions, press 1.
To schedule a personalized demo, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to a demo specialist.

navigationGoals: I need to schedule a personalized CRM demo as soon as possible
I need to schedule a personalized demo of your CRM to help me manage contacts for my veterans nonprofit.
I’d like to schedule a personalized walkthrough of your AI-powered CRM platform with a demo specialist.
I’d like to schedule a one-on-one demo of your CRM and have someone walk me through the features slowly.
I’d like to schedule a demo of your CRM to see how it can help me manage my physics research collaborations.

contents.text: To discuss enterprise pricing and plans, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to a pricing consultant.

navigationGoals: I’d like a detailed discussion on enterprise pricing and plan options
I’d like to discuss enterprise pricing plans for your CRM to support my organization’s growing outreach.
I need to review enterprise-tier pricing structures and licensing options for your relationship intelligence solution.
I need to discuss enterprise-level pricing options and plan details for my organization.
I need details on enterprise pricing for a campus‐wide license for our university physics lab.

contents.text: For customer support and technical assistance, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to our technical support team.

navigationGoals: I need prompt technical support for the platform
I’m having trouble with the CRM’s email integration and need technical support to get it working.
I’m experiencing API integration errors with the AI relationship intelligence service and need technical support.
I can’t log into my account and need technical support to help me fix the issue.
I’m running into an error integrating your CRM API with my data‐analysis pipeline and need technical support.

contents.text: For billing and account questions, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to our billing department.

navigationGoals: I have billing and account questions about my subscription
I need help updating our subscription billing information and understanding the latest invoice charges.
I want to clarify my subscription billing cycle and invoice charges for my CRM account.
I have a question about my latest invoice and need help understanding the charges.
I have a question about a recent billing charge on my student subscription account.
